StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterBilletDataByMonthCalendarYear]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @DisplayCode int, @Month varchar(2), @CalendarYear varchar(4) AS
declare @billet_id int, @billet_begin_date varchar(30), @billet_end_date varchar(30), @organiza.on_id int, @recruiter_id uniqueiden..er
DECLARE @Temp TABLE (Org int) INSERT INTO @Temp VALUES(@Organiza.onID) INSERT INTO @Temp SELECT Decendent FROM [USMC].[vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Parent = @Organiza.onID
CREATE TABLE #BILLET_DATA (BILLET_ID int, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE VARCHAR(30), BILLET_END_DATE VARCHAR(30), RECRUITER_ID uniqueiden..er, ORGANIZATION_ID int)
DECLARE billet_data CURSOR FOR
SELECT B.BilletID, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), R.BilletBeginDate, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BilletBeginDate, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), R.BilletEndDate, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BilletEndDate, R.Organiza.onID, R.RecruiterID FROM Recruiter R LEFT OUTER JOIN Billet B ON R.BilletID = B.BilletID WHERE ((BilletEndDate IS NOT NULL AND (CONVERT(date.me, @Month + '/1/' + @CalendarYear) BETWEEN CONVERT(date.me, CAST(DATEPART(MONTH, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR) + '/1/' + CAST(DATEPART(YEAR, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR)) AND BilletEndDate)) OR (BilletEndDate IS NULL AND TourEndDate IS NULL AND BilletBeginDate IS NOT NULL AND (CONVERT(date.me, @Month + '/1/' + @CalendarYear) BETWEEN CONVERT(date.me, CAST(DATEPART(MONTH, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR) + '/1/' + CAST(DATEPART(YEAR, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR)) AND GETDATE())) OR (BilletEndDate IS NULL AND TourEndDate IS NOT NULL AND (CONVERT(date.me, @Month + '/1/' + @CalendarYear) BETWEEN CONVERT(date.me, CAST(DATEPART(MONTH, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR) + '/1/' + CAST(DATEPART(YEAR, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR)) AND COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), R.TourEndDate, 106), SPACE(0)))) OR (BilletBeginDate IS NULL AND TourEndDate IS NULL AND BilletEndDate IS NULL) ) AND ((@DisplayCode=1 AND Organiza.onID = @Organiza.onID) OR (@DisplayCode=2 AND Organiza.onID IN (SELECT Org FROM @Temp)))
UNION
SELECT BilletID, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), BilletBeginDate, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BilletBeginDate, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), BilletEndDate, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BilletEndDate, OrgUnitID, RecruiterID FROM RecruiterHistory WHERE (BilletBeginDate IS NOT NULL AND (CONVERT(date.me, @Month + '/1/' + @CalendarYear) BETWEEN CONVERT(date.me, CAST(DATEPART(MONTH, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR) + '/1/' + CAST(DATEPART(YEAR, BilletBeginDate) AS VARCHAR)) AND BilletEndDate)) AND ((@DisplayCode=1 AND OrgUnitID = @Organiza.onID) OR (@DisplayCode=2 AND OrgUnitID IN (SELECT Org FROM @Temp)))
OPEN billet_data
FETCH next from billet_data INTO @billet_id, @billet_begin_date, @billet_end_date, @organiza.on_id, @recruiter_id
WHILE (@@fetch_status = 0) BEGIN INSERT INTO #BILLET_DATA VALUES(@billet_id, @billet_begin_date, @billet_end_date, @recruiter_id, @organiza.on_id) FETCH next from billet_data INTO @billet_id, @billet_begin_date, @billet_end_date, @organiza.on_id, @recruiter_id END
CLOSE billet_data DEALLOCATE billet_data
SELECT BILLET_ID, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, BILLET_END_DATE, RECRUITER_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID FROM #BILLET_DATA
